sections.content:
Here at Millionaire Access we aspire to be dominant in **EVERY** form of human endeavor, as said by Andrew Tate.

The top endeavors are:
> Mindset and Physicality
> Relationships with men and women
> Money

On this challenge, we will focus on the first and the last ones.
‎
The main goal of this program is to have you an **IMPROVED MAN** by the end of the next 30 days, mainly - **CLEAN FROM PORN.**
‎
You guys asked for it because you know how much damage it brings to your life and how better your life will be without it.
‎
This challenge isn’t mandatory. However, it is adamant you work on EVERY ASPECT OF YOURSELF!
‎
Porn is poison. And is currently one of the greatest addictions of our generation.

It predates on a man's primal desire to reproduce with attractive females. It's cheap, and it's everywhere.
‎
And most importantly - it's being weaponized as a tool to keep you weak and controllable.
‎
Women are the biggest weakness for men.
‎
I don't want this to be some bullshit 'No Nut January' where you accomplish zero and just talking about your peeps.
‎
This is meant to transform you from a weak kid, to a strong man.
‎
Let's lay the rules for the program:
‎
> **1-** NO PORN. NO SOFT NUDITY OR ANYTHING
> ‎
> **2-** NO SOCIAL MEDIA. Delete your Instagram and Facebook.
> Note- if you use it for business, it's fine to keep. Delete all females from your following list tho.
> ‎
> **3-** No masturbation, edging or whatever. Only touch your thingie when you go to pee. Nothing else
> ‎
> **4-** YOU WILL DO SOMETHING PHYSICAL - DAILY. I don't care if it's a gym, fighting, or just pushups.
> ‎
> **5-** YOU WILL SET A 'MILLIONAIRE ACCESS' GOAL TO ACCOMPLISH WITH A $ AT THE END.
> ‎
> **6-** YOU WILL POST EVERY SINGLE DAY IN <#1125536055609786501>.

**Frequently Asked Questions regarding the challenge:**

**Can I keep using Social Media if I need it for business/Marketing BootCamp?**
- Yes. Simply unfollow all females from your page.

**I'm already avoiding porn and masturbation with splendid success. Can I still take the challenge?**
- Absolutely. Pick up another bad habit you'd like to break or be there to encourage your fellow Students!

**I'm a woman and would still like to take on the challenge.**
- You're most welcome to participate! Choose a bad habit to break, and join us!
Keep in mind it'll be centered on PMO. You will still get the benefits tho!

**When is the first day? Today is X of January. Can I still join?**
- The first day is the day you decide to take action. Calendar days mean nothing. Don't let the calendar stand in your way to glory.
